lines: 1. Monen' Omorisia tinkoremerwa;Antimoki'as'obonyansi obobese;Ondair' ensemo amach' amaya;Nigo akong'irania na komboria.
2. Ning'et' ase rigoko ri' amakweri;Aye nomorendi, tindi n'obwoba;Nondisie n'enyimbo buya kegima;Tinkoba n'obobe, Kor' amo nainche.
3. Nondageri' ekero nden' emechando;Ninyore ebisio ebinge mono;Nong'ak' amaguta omotwe one;Tinkoboria kende biaisanire.
4. 'Buya n'amabera kwabing'eire;Bimbwatie botambe erio nkorore;Mbwati' encher' abakoro baetete;Goik' ens' engiya, bogambi bwao.
